At the scan
You may be asked to drink a 
lot	of	fluid	before	you	have	the	
scan. A full bladder pushes your 
uterus up and this gives a better 
picture. You then lie on your 
back and some jelly is put on 
your abdomen. An instrument is 
passed backwards and forwards 
over your skin and high-
frequency sound is beamed 
through your abdomen to
